sentences.english: The Comforter is the Holy Ghost.
Heir of salvation, purchase of God, born of his Spirit, washed in his blood.
sentences.chinese: 为父神后嗣，已得救赎，从圣灵得生，宝血洗净。

sentences.english: Holy Spirit and Eschatology in Paul.
sentences.chinese: 保罗思想中的圣灵观与末世论。

sentences.english: Blest, divine, eternal Spirit, Fill with power and fill me now.
sentences.chinese: 求主圣灵来充满我，以你大爱溢心间。

sentences.english: The spirit that hovers over the chaos in Genesis 1, that refers to the Holy Spirit.
sentences.chinese: 《创世纪》第一章盘旋在混沌之上的灵，指的是圣灵。

sentences.english: The god has prepared four rivers for the human, that explains the Holy Ghost plentiful supply.
sentences.chinese: 神给人预备了四道河，那是说明到圣灵丰满的供应。

sentences.english: This spoke of their need of salvation first and then the oil spoke of power.
sentences.chinese: 这预表我们先需要救恩，然后再需要圣灵的能力。

sentences.english: Through the Spirit they urged Paul not to go on to Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 他们被圣灵感动，对保罗说，不要上耶路撒冷去。

sentences.english: And the Holy Spirit indwelling the saints co-operates with Christ in this blessed work.
sentences.chinese: 圣徒里面内住的圣灵与基督一同执行这件神圣的工作。

sentences.english: When I am burned out infuse me with the light of the Holy Spirt.
sentences.chinese: 当我耗尽时，以圣灵之光激励我。

sentences.english: Christ would ascend to heaven, and pray the Father to send the Comforter, the Holy Spirit.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣升上高天，求天父上帝，赐下圣灵保惠师。

sentences.english: The promptings of the Holy Spirit will warn you that God is not pleased with the direction your thoughts and feelings are taking you.
sentences.chinese: 圣灵会警示你神不喜悦你念头和想法的方向。

sentences.english: Redemptive work of the Holy Spirit is inherently eschatological.
sentences.chinese: 圣灵的救赎工作，本质上是末世性的。

sentences.english: It is the Holy Spirit’s job to produce Christlike character in you.
sentences.chinese: 把你创造成耶稣的模样，这就是圣灵的工作。

sentences.english: And be not drunk with wine, wherein is excess; but be filled with the Spirit;
sentences.chinese: 不要醉酒，酒能使人放荡，乃要被圣灵充满。

sentences.english: Being born of the Spirit means much more than we generally take it to mean.
sentences.chinese: 从圣灵重生的意味，远远深于我们平常所认识的。

definition: feudal term of praise for ruler, king or emperor/general term for saint in former times/term for God during the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom 太平天國|太平天国/Holy Spirit (in Christian Trinity)
God (in Catholicism)/abbr. for 天主教[Tian1 zhu3 jiao4], Catholicism
Holy Son/Jesus Christ/God the Son (in the Christian Trinity)
Holy Father/God the Father (in the Christian Trinity)
(third person pronoun for a divine being)
